name: Kudu Hunt Gruppe 2
description:
This includes a powerpoint presentation and a source video of gameplay.

Click on the file "Hunt a bitch v5" to play

Video link: https://youtu.be/CT1HITaqSu8

Made by: Rikke, Anita, Frederik, Nicolai, Jakob & Christian

Controls: WASD & Arrow Keys

Enter button to start when in game & Alt+F4 to exit the game
